survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Window Shades Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on the usability, features, and overall satisfaction with smart window shades to improve product offerings and customer experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your smart window shades?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clear satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is mobile-friendly.

questions.question_text: Which features of your smart window shades do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure technical issues. Ensure the options are clear and mutually exclusive.
